description: Conversion of the blocks from flats/bedsits to sheltered accommodation comprising 25 one bedroom units  one bedsit unit  one two bedroom unit and 8 room special care elderly persons accommodation along with associated dining facilities  laundry and other associated facilities.Single storey end extensions and other minor alterations also proposed (as revised and amplified by letter dated 09.09.91 & 15.09.91).
decision_conditions: To comply with the provisions of Section 91(1) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990.
